author: Techlore
description:
In today's digital age, it can feel harder than ever to maintain privacy. In this video we provide 5 practical steps for beginners to reclaim some privacy, from securing your accounts to minimizing your digital footprint.

Thank you to our sponsor Notesnook who offers open source, E2EE notes to keep your ideas safe: https://notesnook.com

Check out the Become Anonymous guide: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a1i-3xwcSGA
A little intro to digital minimalism in my life: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yXUeiWd4QZM

title: 5 Easy Ways to Improve Privacy!
